sources.title: Rubric Compliance Validation Report - Task 003
sources.synthesis: Identified 2 violations (RD Stage 0, RMM implicit) and 4 warnings (GHG assurance x2, RD framework x2) in rubric alignment; 91.3% acceptable but 73.9% exact match suggests precision improvements needed

sources.title: ESG Maturity Rubric v3.0 Official Specification
sources.synthesis: Defines 7 dimensions with 0-4 stage criteria; Stage 3 GHG = 'limited assurance', Stage 4 = 'reasonable assurance'; RD Stage 0 = 'no formal ESG reporting'; RMM Stage 2 = 'defined risk taxonomy; periodic assessments'

sources.title: Differential Testing Results - Task 003
sources.synthesis: Validated 100% determinism across 2,447 test cases (1,200 fuzz cases); 0 crashes; establishes baseline for post-refinement determinism verification
